CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Similarly , the measured field - effect mobility of PFD2TBT , PFD2TBT-5Per , and PFD2TBT-10Per was 2.7 × 10^-6 , 1.1 × 10^-5 , and 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / ( V s ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFD2TBT |
| PFD2TBT-5Per |
| PFD2TBT-10Per |

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph. They are precisely the same as in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFD2TBT |
| PFD2TBT-5Per |
| PFD2TBT-10Per |

I have removed the phrase "the measured field-effect mobility of" as it does not refer to a material name. The remaining entities are the material names mentioned in the paragraph and are precisely the same as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Similarly , the measured field - effect mobility of PFD2TBT , PFD2TBT-5Per , and PFD2TBT-10Per was 2.7 × 10^-6 , 1.1 × 10^-5 , and 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / ( V s ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| measured field - effect mobility |
| 2.7 × 10^-6 cm^2 / ( V s ) |
| 1.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / ( V s ) |
| 2.1 × 10^-5 cm^2 / ( V s ) |

However, I am assuming that you are only interested in the property name as a category or type, rather than the specific values of the property. Therefore, the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name" would be:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| measured field - effect mobility |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I see that the only clear "Property Name" entity that refers to a material property is:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| measured field - effect mobility |

The other entities in the table are specific values of the property, rather than the property name itself.
